name: Whoa! Rotate
author: Brad Parbs

sections.description: Whoa! Rotate gives you an easy to use shortcode that will rotate your page for the user. Just use the shortcode [whoa-rotate] anywhere in a page or post. Perfect for April Fools or for joke pages.
sections.installation:
1. Upload `whoarotate.zip` to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the [whoarotate] shortcode to any page or post.
  4. ???
  5. Profit!
sections.faq:
How do I enable it?

Just add [whoarotate] in any post or page, and watch the page spin!

short_description: Whoa! Rotate gives you an easy to use shortcode that will rotate your page for the user. Just use the shortcode [whoa-rotate] anywhere in a page.
